local_intent: After scanning, detect the red_plate, approach and align, lower until contact, verify contact, open gripper to release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is currently held by the gripper from prior steps
Camera can see the red_plate after the scan
Workspace remains unchanged during this transfer phase
coherence_with_global: This subtree continues the MainTree transfer phase: it realizes detection of the red_plate, precise approach, gentle lowering with contact verification, release, and retreat as specified in the global plan.
